transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello. 

Customer: Haan ji sir, aapka call disconnect ho gaya tha.

Executive: Haan. Ji, bataiye.

Customer: Haan ji. So aap ye dekho sir, aapka na ek option aa raha hoga more option ka jahan pe drop down laga hua hai. 

Customer: Usme third option hai category report ka.

Executive: Uh, mujhe more option nahi dikh raha. Ye kya hum log left side mein dekhenge settings wale?

Customer: Right hand side pe ekdum. Jaise hi product pe click kiya. Product pe click karne ke baad right hand side pe aap dekhoge. Pehle aapka haan more option mein third option hai category report.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Category report mein na upar kuch options likhe hue hain. Isme ek product performance report aa raha hoga aa kar ke aapka.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Aap product performance report pe jaaiye.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Yahan se aap mainly check kar sakte hain ki aapke jo product hai uski performance report kya chal rahi hai aur kahan pe aapka product ka score missing hai aur kahan pe kya cheeze add karne se aapko benefit rahega aur sabse achi cheez yahan se aap na ek apna ek data maintain kar sakte ho ki aapko kis product mein IndiaMART se kitna traffic generate ho ke aa raha hai aur wahan pe aapne us product pe kitne replies aur call back kare hain.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Ye ek bahut acha option IndiaMART mein new add hua hai. Aaj subah hi hamari isko lekar ke training hui hai sir.

Executive: Theek hai. Thank you. Haan abhi main dekh raha hun to samajh mein aa raha hai. Hai na isme aap khud hi de rakhi hai ji.

Customer: Product ki scoring de rakhi hai isme aur agar jaise for example kisi bhi product ki scoring de rakhi hai jaise man lo pehle product ki scoring hai 85. To uske jaise hi aap product ke naam pe click karoge to aap us product ke PQ se pahunch jaoge product quality score pe. To aap wahan se ja ke usko correct kar sakte ho same time pe.

Executive: Okay. 

Customer: Aur ye ek bahut acha option hai ki isme catalog view is wale product mein kitna generate hua hai isme inquiry kitni generate hui hai calls kitni generate hui hai. Aur un uske against reply aur call back hamari side se kitne gaye hain.

Executive: Okay. Haan.

Customer: Haan ji. Aap thoda sa yahan se bifurcate kar ke apni leads ko follow up kar sakte hain sir.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Theek hai? Abhi to yahi cheeze mere ko aapki profile mein missing dikhi sir. Else to aapka profile bahut acha bana hua hai IndiaMART ka.

Executive: Theek hai. Thank you so much.

Customer: Ispe thoda sa kaam karenge sir to for sure aapko benefit milega. In future main ek kaam karti hun main ab Bulbul ki manager baat kar rahi hun. Agar aapko lagta hai aap unse nahi baat karna chahte ho ya fir unki cheeze aapko nahi samajh mein aa rahi hai to main aapko whatsapp pe mere number se hi kar deti hun. Aap mujhe connect kar lijiyega.

Executive: Okay sure. Chalega.

Customer: Main aapko mera number whatsapp pe hi kar ke bhej deti hun mere number se aap please save kar lijiyega. Thank you. Aur koi concern hai sir aapka?

Executive: No.

Customer: Abhi jo aapka ek concern aaya hua tha negative feedback ka kya main usko close kar dun aap mere diye hue solutions se satisfy hain sir?

Executive: Haan, right. Ji.

Customer: Theek hai sir. Main close kar deti hun.

Executive: Theek hai. Thank you so much.

Customer: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's profile missing key information.

- Customer had a negative feedback concern.



Resolution:

- Executive explained product performance report feature.

- Executive offered direct support via WhatsApp.

- Closed the negative feedback concern.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to send contact via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- product performance, category report, whatsapp support, negative feedback
